TopicTitle: looking for a mod that retextures some fuel tanks and engines

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I was looking at the screen shots of some of my old ships from previous versions, and I had to ask. Does anyone know of a mod that re-textures the fuel tanks and engines back to what they looked like originally? Stats are all the same on them, and the new fuel tanks stay the same. The only thing that changed is the look of the fuel tanks that we had originally.

I don't know if this is what you're looking for (it doesn't re-texture any thing) it puts the original parts back in the game.

The parts don't appear in the new career mode, I'll update it eventually.

Original KSP parts
